description:
Provide an interactive CLI wizard that walks users through customizing templates with prompts for common options (extensions, runtime versions, ports, etc.) instead of manual JSON editing.

**Rationale:** Manual JSON editing is error-prone and intimidating for less experienced developers. A guided wizard lowers the barrier to entry and reduces configuration mistakes.
title: Interactive template customization wizard
